none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2018-12-new-york-taps/extracted/New York Taps/01 Steal Shit (For My Girl)
New York Taps - New York Taps
New York Taps - New York Taps

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 30, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
Sometimes I don't need context, or even fukkn relevance. Sometimes a dose of LAMF punk rock 'n roll does the trick, and that's surely the case with this NEW YORK TAPS demo. Snotty and shitty and loose and raw like that New York - DC corridor in 1978. Dig those double snare taps, dig the unwieldy guitar, dig the acoustic number dropped in the middle for no apparent reason other than they do what they wanna fukkn do, dig that fat low end Black Dots session bass guitar. Yeah...sometimes you just need everything to click.  NEW YORK TAPS
https://newyorktaps.bandcamp.com/
